comment: After seeing the intel , I don t believe it supports conclusion that killing Soleimani will stop Iranian plotting or reduce risk to American lives . Trump s decision does , however , increase likelihood of war with Iran and threaten our gains against ISIS . It was a reckless move . <URL>

      :snt1 (b / believe-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)

                                    :op1 "Trump")))
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (s2 / stop-01

                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Soleimani")))
                              :ARG1 (p3 / plot-01
                                    :ARG0 (p4 / person
                                          :mod (c / country
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Iran")))))
                        :op2 (r / reduce-01
                              :ARG0 k
                              :ARG1 (r2 / risk-01
                                    :ARG2 (l / live-01
                                          :ARG0 (p5 / person
                                                :mod (c2 / country

                                                            :op1 "America"))))))))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (s3 / see-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / intelligence))))
      :snt2 (m2 / move-02
            :mod (r3 / reckless)
            :domain (ii3 / it)))
